profileText: a Representative from Montana; born March 4, 1967; graduated from Indio High School, Indio, Calif., 1985; attended New York University, New York, N.Y.; United States Air Force and California Air National Guard, 2001-2009; research scientist; teacher; business owner; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the United States Senate in 2018; Montana state auditor, 2021-2024; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).

creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: Downing, Troy Bryan. Java RMI: Remote Method Invocation. Foster City, California: IDG Books Worldwide, 1998.
Fox, David, and Troy Downing. HTML Web Publisher's Construction Kit: Publishing Your Own HTML Pages on the Internet. Clinton, Maryland: Waite Group, 1995.
Meyer, John, and Troy Downing. Java Virtual Machine. Sebastopol, California: O’Reilly Media, 1997.
Tyma, Paul M., Gabriel Torok, and Troy Downing. Java Primer Plus: Supercharging Web Applications With the Java Programming Language. Clinton, Maryland: Waite Group, 1996.
